You should add a toggle option where the basic lands are only the most recent set, otherwise it takes like 20 seconds to load. 2. Card search should show prices of the card and maybe price history like TCGPlayer. 3. Make cards in trading automatically adjust it to the cheapest set, then you can change it to the correct set.

28/9/23 the app had sadly become buggy. When it's opened, if it's been a few days, it starts a download of all sets, even ones from years ago and if you try and search while the update is running, it just freezes and crashes. Down to 4 stars. App is great, no ads and no paid content or features that must be unlocked. Sure there are extra things that could be added but the app updated frequently, bugs are fixed and sets are added as they release. Couldn't really ask for more from a FREE app.

Occasional bugs, but usually fixed within a few weeks. Small price to pay for a free app with no ads that has steadily gained features over the years. Love how I can build decks offline and how not storing card images locally makes the file size for the app very reasonable.

This app very comprensive and user friendly. Only real issue I have with this app is as follows: -When I open the app, all of the sets have to load. I cannot search for cards or change a card's printing until all sets are loaded.

This is by far the most comprehensive app for magic out there. Even so its a MUST have for any magic player. The search features are great and easy to use. A feature that would be nice to have would be the option to exclude certain sets (e.g., Unglued, Unstable, Mystery Booster) from searches.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: It's not quite what you want, but if you set the format to Vintage it excludes silver-border cards (and banned cards like the ante ones and chaos orb)

Amazing. Use it all the time. Use it for making trades as fair as possible, use it for keeping track of commander damage in EDH, use it for keeping track of mana when playing Storm, use it for playing Momir Basic IRL, use it for looking cards up, use it for checking rules. This app is the centre of my MTG life.
I love this app, it has everything that I need. I use it to help buy decks, and manage my current ones. It has a life counter and dice and other very helpful tools. I love you devs!
Has absolutely everything one would need in a MTG app. Life counters, good card search engine, a complete rules list, wish list, the list goes on. I'm never looking back on this one.
